description: This is an example of changing language.

header.description1: In a world where our most beautiful moments remain captured in our phones, EazyPostCard allows you to give them a second life.
header.description2: With EazyPostCard, transform your photos into real postcards and send them around the world in just a few clicks.

header.title: Design in minutes, publish your postcards in seconds.
header.description3: with templates. Discover thousands of designs and categories.

step1.title: STEP 01
step1.subtitle: Select a template
step1.description: Choose from a variety of templates from our available designs or start from scratch.

step2.title: STEP 02
step2.subtitle: Add your photos
step2.description: Upload your favorite photos to include in your postcard. Make sure they are of good quality for the best results.

step3.title: STEP 03
step3.subtitle: Include a personalized message
step3.description: Write a heartfelt or fun message to accompany your postcard. Personalize it for the person you are sending it to.

step4.title: STEP 04
step4.subtitle: Send your postcard to anyone
step4.description: Choose the recipient's address and send your postcard with one click. Share your memories with loved ones, wherever they are.

header.title: Causes that concern us all!
header.description: Engaging postcards sent collectively to raise awareness and mobilize around universal causes, turning each message into a concrete and impactful act.

causes.pub_navigate: Your postcards, a voice for the causes that matter.

instawall.description: Discover InstaWall, the space where your memories take on a new dimension.

footer.description: Every image has a story to tell...
